text.section: In this section, "navigational aid" means a beacon, lighthouse, or other aid to navigation.
This title does not authorize acquisition of more than 5 acres to be used for a navigational aid.

If the land that is needed for a navigational aid is under navigable waters in the State and an agent of the United States submits to the Governor an application that describes the site, the Governor may:
cede jurisdiction over the land; and
convey any title that the State holds in the land.
